6/* NAME
7/* user_acl 3h
8/* SUMMARY
9/* Convert uid to username and check against given ACL.
10/* SYNOPSIS
11/* #include <user_acl.h>
12/*

14/* .nf
15

17 * System library
18 */

21

23 * Utility library.
24 */
25#include <vstring.h>
26
27 /*
28 * External interface
29 */
30extern const char *check_user_acl_byuid(const char *, const char *, uid_t);
